attributes.action: Stop the 'slimming' of bins in towns and cities all across the country
attributes.background: Across the country councils have been 'slimming'  the bins. This is to encourage people to recycle - this is not effective. For families across the country being forced to have a slimmed bin it is terrible. There is not enough room to store a 4person family's rubbish, this is forcing fly tipping.

rejection.details:
Bins are the responsibility of local councils.

If you would like the UK Government to require all councils to provide bins of a certain size, you could start a new petition asking for that.
